short_summary: Construction of a storage equipment shop at Nashlyn Pasture.
description: Construction of a new post frame building for storage equipment at Nashlyn Pasture Site. The project objective is to supply and construct a new 16.46m x 21.95m post frame shop building including all necessary systems.
duration_in_months: This is a bid that will take 26 weeks or approximately 6 months to complete.
full_summary:
**Nashlyn Pasture Storage Equipment Shop**
=====================================

### Official Government Tender Announcement

*   **Reference Number:** PW-23-01027156
*   **Solicitation Number:** 5000070097

### Project Overview

The Department of Environment and Climate Change (ECCC) invites qualified contractors to respond to a Two-Phase Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) for the construction of a new post-frame building for storage equipment at Nashlyn Pasture Site in Saskatchewan, Canada.

### ITQ Details

*   **First Phase (Qualification):**
    *   Bidders will submit their qualifications and undergo evaluation for the project.
*   **Second Phase (Financial Bid):**
    *   Qualified bidders will participate in a financial bid phase where the award-winning contractor will be chosen based on their price and financial qualifications.

### Project Scope

The proposed project involves the design, material, and labor required for the construction of a new 16.46m (54’-0”) x 21.95m (72’-0”) post-frame shop building, including:

*   Shop area
*   Kitchen/office area
*   Washroom
*   Mechanical/electrical room
*   Storage mezzanine
*   Building systems (roofs, walls, doors, windows, HVAC, plombier and electrical site services)

### Delivery and Timeline

*   The contractor must complete the project within 26 weeks from the accepted start date.
*   All necessary work and documents must be submitted in the official language of choice.

### Important Information

*   The estimated total value for this project is between $450,000.00 and $650,000.00 (excluding taxes).
*   All bidders must review the attached ITQ for additional information on requirements, qualifications, and selection process.

### Contact Information

The point of contact for this tender is:

*   Shawn Davis
*   Phone: None
*   Email: [shawn.davis@ec.gc.ca](mailto:shawn.davis@ec.gc.ca)
*   Website: [www.ec.gc.ca](http://www.ec.gc.ca)

### ITQ Documents

The ITQ documents can be downloaded from the following link:

*   English: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/22/c2e97a7157280e5d6ba36e14616b120c/5000070097_itq
